name: d3-interpolate
description: Interpolate numbers, colors, strings, arrays, objects, whatever!

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n interpolate -o build/interpolate.js && uglifyjs build/interpolate.js -c -m -o build/interpolate.min.js && rm -f build/interpolate.zip && zip -j build/interpolate.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/interpolate.js build/interpolate.min.js
